data.text:
Privacy Policy for TapWaterSafety.com

Last updated: September 12th 2023

Introduction

Welcome to TapWaterSafety.com. This Privacy Policy outlines how we use cookies on your device through Google Analytics and Google Ads.

Google Analytics

We use Google Analytics to monitor and analyze web traffic. Google Analytics tracks your interaction with the website and stores information like IP addresses. For more information on Google Analytics' privacy practices, you can visit their Privacy Policy.

Google Ads

We use Google Ads for advertising. Google Ads uses cookies to serve ads based on your past visits to our website. You may opt-out of Google Ads by visiting the Google Ads settings page.

Your Choices

You have the option to opt-out of targeted advertising by visiting the settings page of the respective service.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

Contact Us

For any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
